scripts.start:dist: npm run build:dist && cd dist && python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000
scripts.start: npm run start:dist & npm run start:lib & wait
scripts.build:dist: webpack --mode production && cp -r public dist && npm run clean:structure
scripts.build: tsc --build && cp -rf lib/src/* lib/ && npm run clean:structure
scripts.postversion: git add lib dist ../eosdt-affiliate/dist && git commit -am 'Update dev widget iframe $npm_package_version' && git push origin master
